document.topic_text: August 18, 2016 Why Indonesia Might Be Cutting Rates 04:30 - Alicia Garcia-Herrero, Natixis chief Asia-Pacific economist, discusses the growth prospects for Indonesia, the outlook for China's economy and Fed policy with Bloomberg's Yvonne Man and Betty Liu on "Daybreak Asia." (Source: Bloomberg) August 18, 2016 Why Investors Should Brace for Emerging Market Rate Cuts August 16, 2016 Full Show: Bloomberg West (08/16) August 15, 2016
